com.nandox.jop.core.context

Class RequestContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nandox.jop.core.context.RequestContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanAppContext

    public class RequestContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements BeanAppContext
    Implementation of Request Application Context.

    The request context is instanced for each http request processed by dispatcher.
    It contains expression value map [expression id,expression value] and refreshable block map [block id, block]

    Author:
    Fernando Costantino
